title: Ep 76 | Jase's Pandemic Gold, Churches Under Lockdown & What to Do if You're Unhappy at Your Job
description:
Jase is shocked by what he saw when he hit the lake for some pandemic fishing. If you're running low on fish or eggs (aka pandemic gold!), Jase is your man. Phil's been eating good in the quarantine — maybe too good. Church buildings are closed, but Phil, Jase, and Al still see the church flourishing under government lockdowns. And the guys answer an audience question: How can you work a full-time job and still be happy?

https://BlackRifleCoffee.com/PHIL enter the code PHIL for 20% OFF

https://KEEPS.com/DOOR
